$\green{4}{,}570$ is composed of:  
$\green{4 \text{ thousands}} + 5 \text{ hundreds} + 7 \text{ tens}$.  

 We can use place value to express this in a different way.

$\green{4 \text{ thousands}}$ can be written as $\blue{3 \text{ thousands} + 1 \text{ thousand}}$.  

So, $\green{4 \text{ thousands}} + 5 \text{ hundreds}$ can be regrouped this way:  

$\green{4 \text{ thousands}} + 5 \text{ hundreds}$  
$\begin{align}&=\blue{3 \text{ thousands} + 1 \text{ thousand}} + 5 \text{ hundreds}\\
&= 3 \text{ thousands} + 10 \text{ hundreds} + 5 \text{ hundreds}\\
&= 3 \text{ thousands} + \purple{15} \text{ hundreds}.\end{align}$

The other digits will not change.

|  | | | | |
- | :- | :-| :-| :-
$4{,}570$ | $=$ | $4 \text{ thousands}$ | $+$| $5\text{ hundreds}$ | $+$| $7 \text{ tens}$
$4{,}570$ | $=$ | $3 \text{ thousands}$ | $+$| $\maroonD{15\text{ hundreds}}$ | $+$| $7 \text{ tens}$
